page.title: 20The Authors
page.content: This information was collected by the 9-11 year olds at{Sigglesthorne {Primary school}in the Summer of 1985. We surveyed our area by walking to various locations. We found that we already had quite a lot of local knowledge which we could use to complete the project. We also wrote our own project books which contain accounts of Sigglesthorne and the original Domesday Book of 1086, and accounts of various aspects of Norman Britain. We completed our project books by looking at life in Sigglesthorne in 1985. Mr.Steven Robinson(Headteacher) was helped by:Michael Hinchliffe,James Kirk,Mark Hillyard,Richard Haines,Guy Salvidge,John Smith,Christopher Kirk, Clair Atherton,Sarah Varley,Sarah Watson,Jane Hodgson,Rachel Varley,Lisa Hara,Mandy Thorley and Zoe Rowden.
